definitions.definition: Undergoing a resurgence ; experiencing renewed vigor or vitality .
Of a celestial object, moving upwards relative to the horizon after a period of having moved downwards.
Rising again, as from the dead.

main_definition: Undergoing a resurgence ; experiencing renewed vigor or vitality .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) Of a celestial object, moving upwards relative to the horizon after a period of having moved downwards.
Rising again, as from the dead.
